t: Kings of Leon - Fans [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: This is an excellent song which I highly recommend. The other single of the era "Charmer", has a remix of "My Party" which is just OK. Kings of Leon have a lot of b-sides so I would have to believe a Rarities/B-Sides album will come eventually (a la the Killers "Sawdust").
